body:
Alright, I've done a bit more refactoring on this and simplified the approach, while making it a bit more Reacty.

Essentially, I've converted what was the `AbstractFormPage` into a `GenericFormContainer` component. This solves a handful of problems surrounding state, and alleviates some of the extra complexity which came out of the template approach.

This is ready for another pass.~, though requires some tests.~
